00051    // Construction
00052  public:
00053    cmKey(cmExperiment * pExperiment, QString * strKeyName);
00054    cmKey(cmKey * pRootKey, QString * strKeyName);
00055    ~cmKey();
00056 
00057    // Attributes
00058  private:
00059    HNDLE m_hDB;                 
00060    HNDLE m_hKey;                
00061    BOOL m_bValid;               
00062    KEY m_Key;                   
00063    cmExperiment *m_pExperiment; 
00064 
00065    // Operations
00066  public:
00068     HNDLE GetHdb() {
00069       return m_hDB;
00070    };
00072    HNDLE GetHkey() {
00073       return m_hKey;
00074    };
00076    BOOL IsValid() {
00077       return m_bValid;
00078    };
00080    INT GetType() {
00081       return m_Key.type;
00082    };
00084    INT GetItemSize() {
00085       return m_Key.item_size;
00086    };
00088    WORD GetAccessMode() {
00089       return m_Key.access_mode;
00090    };
00092    INT GetNumValues() {
00093       return m_Key.num_values;
00094    };
00095    INT UpdateKey();
00096    INT HotLink(void *addr, WORD access, void (*dispatcher) (INT, INT, void *),
00097                void *window);
00098    INT Unlink();
00099 
00100    INT GetData(void *data, INT * size, DWORD type);
00101    INT SetData(void *data, INT num_values, DWORD type);
00102    INT SetDataIndex(void *data, INT index, DWORD type);
00103    DWORD GetKeyTime();
